div:
About Alert
Logic MAS
Alert
Logic MAS
® seamlessly connects an award-winning security platform, cutting-edge threat intelligence, and
expert MAS
defenders – to provide the
best MAS
security and peace of mind for your business 24/7 – at a lower total cost than point solutions, SIEM tools, or traditional security outsourcing vendors. We offer a new approach to evolving threats, expanding compliance risks, and resource constraints - helping you get the right level of security and compliance coverage across any environment. That’s SIEMless Threat Management. Only from Alert
Logic MAS
. Job Summary The Customer Success Manager is a key part of customer health and value directorate, stewarding customer-centricity. This role is charged with playing a pivotal responsibility to managing one-to-many large, enterprise-size customer’s experience, with the goal of utilizing high health and satisfaction benchmarks as guides for success. In extension to this, they will be the customer’s value advocate and
champion MAS
, constantly establishing and monitoring current value received, whilst collaborating with the customer on value expansion. This role is expected to be intimately familiar with Alert
Logic MAS
’s organizational approach to product and
service FEM
delivery, and will be looked upon by the customer as the subject matter
expert MAS
in bringing connections between both organizations effectively and proactively. A deep and sustained understanding of our customer’s needs on product and
service FEM
delivery expectations is required. This
individual MAS
will be strong in Alert
Logic MAS
’s proprietary metrics utilized to evaluate health and value realization. Ultimately, your role is evaluated upon concentrated metrics of NCR, NPS, and CHI; this informs and becomes catalyst to Alert
Logic MAS
’s operational and strategic priorities associated to our customer enterprise segmentation delivery success. The Customer Success Manager will
champion MAS
the customer throughout the engagement lifecycle, enabling them to get
best MAS
value from Alert
Logic MAS
solutions. Further, this role is expected to establish themselves internally with the Alert
Logic MAS
organization as a revered, trusted advisor for enterprise customer segment improvements, as well as ensuring Alert
Logic MAS
is considered as a preferred vendor to the customer. This
individual MAS
will ensure that our delivery infrastructure is modern, innovative and effective, forging a strong and positive overall Alert
Logic MAS
identity and brand with the customer. Primary Responsibilities Build strong, trusted, and influential relationships with assigned customers and within the Alert
Logic MAS
organization: Obtain a
thorough FEM
understanding of the value that drives assigned customer decisions for using Alert
Logic MAS
products and services. Proactively offer appropriately tailored advice and bring
unique MAS
industry insights to the customer, affording opportunity to realize optimal current value, as well as drive and expand value propositions. Provide feedback to customers to streamline
service FEM
and product delivery. Engage in on-going, two-way dialogue with customers regarding ways to improve engagement and use of our product and services. Develop
trust FEM
-based relationships with multiple levels within the customer’s organization.
Understand FEM
what feedback strategy strengthens the customer relationship and indoctrinate an effective feedback mechanism between the customer and Alert
Logic MAS
. Develop strong and trusted relationships within Alert
Logic MAS
leadership as to Encourage reception to organizational improvements and added-value propositions. Ensure customer is consistently, and appropriately, aware of the added value of all the services and products Alert
Logic MAS
is providing, and/or can provide in the future. Responsible for day-to-day management and execution of Customer Success programs: the objectives and goals required to achieving metric improvements. Establish synergistic relationship with the Alert
Logic MAS
sales representative(s) as to promote partnership in evaluating and presenting product /
service FEM
portfolio expansion with the customer(s). Contribute in defining and establishing internal product and
service FEM
delivery processes to help scale the company: to Identify, promote, and drive efficiencies in the enterprise customer segmentation
service FEM
delivery model, both with the customer and within Alert
Logic MAS
. Consistently evaluate inputs from customers to identify delivery satisfaction impact trends. Develop and propose solutions for negative trends. Proven results on delivering/exceeding goals on time, with an attention to detail. Experience managing and prioritizing multiple customer requests in a fast paced environment, including timeline scoping and effective re-prioritization. Demonstrated strong
aptitude MAS
in correlating improvements with health and satisfaction results. Relationship Management:
Aptitude MAS
to build strong relationships and bonds with management, director, and executive-level client base. Experience effectively setting and managing customer expectations. Communication Skills: Exemplary written and oral communication skills. Solid proficiency with Word, Excel and PowerPoint/Keynote for client-ready reports and presentations.
Ability MAS
to reframe and
challenge MAS
the way customers view their businesses, aligning insights to key customer priorities and tying those insights back to Alert
Logic MAS
’s
unique MAS
differentiators. Utilize strong cross-functional effectiveness in order to drive enterprise customer segmentation focus improvements.
Ability MAS
to comprehensively
understand FEM
extreme technical issues and rephrase them in such simplicity that non-technical individuals may follow. Empathetic and Humility Skills: Demonstrate and utilize strong empathy trait,
most MAS
notably used in understanding customers, their frustrations, and root cause analysis. Demonstrate a strong humility trait to establish customer’s issues and perspective more important than self, or that of Alert
Logic MAS
. Influential Skills: Hone strong influential skills needed during introduction meetings with enterprise customer candidates. Expand influential skills when distributing Customer Health Index (CHI) and value proposition discussions to obtain consensus from both the customer and Alert
Logic MAS
leadership. Utilize highly developed negotiation skills with the
ability MAS
to influence product portfolio growth and expand market capture.
Analytical MAS
Skills: Experience with analyzing
data MAS
elements in order to establish correlation and regression drivers with the Customer Health Index (CHI) model. Performs other duties as assigned Required Skills, Experience and Education 3+ years experience in large enterprise account management Strong familiarity and knowledge of infrastructure and networking concepts Proven success in positioning, or selling, SaaS solutions to large enterprise-size customers Keen understanding of the delivery of SaaS solutions to enterprise-size customers
Ability MAS
and willingness to travel at least 25% of the year Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/MIS, or equivalent combination of education and experience required Desired Skills and Experience Extensive knowledge with internal Alert
Logic MAS
operational processes and product /
service FEM
delivery experience(s) Experience working with, or for, a large multinational management consulting, technology services, or outsourcing company Experience with account management in Salesforce.com Education Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science/MIS, or equivalent combination of education and experience required Alert
Logic MAS
is committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know. Notice to recruitment agencies : Alert
Logic MAS
does not accept unsolicited candidate resumes from recruiting agencies. We will not be liable for and will not pay placement fees for unsolicited resumes submitted to our jobs postings, employees or company locations.
